description: Try our easy to follow Roast Chicken Breast With Broccoli Mash recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Roast Chicken Breast With Broccoli Mash
name: Roast Chicken Breast With Broccoli Mash Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place flatbread strips on tray alongside chicken and bake for 10 minutes or until chicken is cooked through and flatbread crisp. Serve chicken with mash, flatbread crisps, yoghurt and cherry tomatoes.
